para.sentence: \wp\left(\tfrac{1}{2}\omega_{1}\right)=e_{1}+\sqrt{(e_{1}-e_{3})(e_{1}-e_{2})} =e_{1}+\omega_{1}^{-2}(K\left(k\right))^{2}k^{\prime}, , \wp\left(\tfrac{1}{2}\omega_{2}\right)=e_{2}-i\sqrt{(e_{1}-e_{2})(e_{2}-e_{3}) }=e_{2}-i\omega_{1}^{-2}(K\left(k\right))^{2}kk^{\prime}, , \wp\left(\tfrac{1}{2}\omega_{3}\right)=e_{3}-\sqrt{(e_{1}-e_{3})(e_{2}-e_{3})} =e_{3}-\omega_{1}^{-2}(K\left(k\right))^{2}k, where k,k^{\prime} and the square roots are real and positive when the lattice is rectangular; otherwise they are determined by continuity from the rectangular case.
